DaD.handler

Class DungeonHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • DaD.handler.DungeonHandler

  • public class DungeonHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to handle dungeons. When hero want to enter a dungeon it is redirected here. Every events will be handled here.
    See Also:
    DungeonInstance, DungeonRoomInstance, DungeonTemplate, DungeonRoomTemplate

      • getInstance

      • dungeonSetting

        public DungeonInstance dungeonSetting()

        Returns:
        DungeonInstance

      • StartDungeon

        public void StartDungeon(Hero hero,
                         DungeonInstance dungeon)
        Show available options to hero. Depending on his choice call different functions.

        If you choose to enter the room here, this will call the FightHandler. Depending on the result of the fight we will either go to next room or leave the dungeon.

        Parameters:
        hero - Hero that enter the dungeon
        dungeon - Choosen dungeonInstance

      • goToDungeonRoom

        private boolean goToDungeonRoom()
        Enter a dungeon room, start the fight with monsters in it and depending on fight result execute function. Return true if Hero succeeded on killing monsters.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • giveReward

        private void giveReward(Hero hero)
        Give to the hero rewards for finishing dungeon.
        Parameters:
        hero - Hero who receives rewards
